mapper.select: select a.area_short_name area_short_name, a.area_file_name area_file_name ,t1.* from area a join (select p.*, pm.plan_mem_role from plan_member pm join plan p on(pm.plan_id = p.plan_id) where pm.mem_email=#{memEmail} and plan_delete_day is null) t1 on a.area_code = t1.plan_area_code order by plan_id desc
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAN SET plan_delete_day = SYSDATE WHERE plan_id = #{planId}
mapper.select: select mem_nick, plan_id, plan_mem_role from plan_member join member using (mem_email) where plan_id = #{planId} and plan_mem_role = 0 and not mem_email = #{memEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into plan_member values (#{planId},(select mem_email from member where mem_nick=#{addNick}),'0')
mapper.delete: delete from plan_member where plan_id = #{planId} and mem_email=(select mem_email from member where mem_nick=#{removeNick})
